# Outline of Referee Report

+ Summary of the paper.
    + This is not the abstract, but closer to a precis.
    + Where it fits in the literature
    + Contribution that the paper makes
+ Major Criticism
    + Point out a major flaw
    + Give some guidance on how to solve the flaw, i.e., give a good reference that helps.
+ Minor criticism
    + Smaller things, like organization, missing citations.
    + Often useful to give pages and paragraph indications.
+ Summary
    + Is the paper acceptable
    + Minimal things that need to be done to make the paper acceptable.
